net.ognyanov.niogram.parser

Interface ErrorDispatcher

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AstParser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Antlr4ToAstParser

    public interface ErrorDispatcher
    An interface for error message dispatchers.
    Author:
    Nikolay Ognyanov

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ErrorDispatcher.ErrorType
      Defines types of errors registered by the grammar:

      Adds a new error listener to the dispatcher.
      Set<ErrorListener> getErrorListeners()
      Retrieves the set of all error listeners

      Retrieves the name of the file currently being processed.

      • notifyErrorListeners

        void notifyErrorListeners(ErrorDispatcher.ErrorType errorType,
                          int line,
                          int position,
                          String message)
        Notifies all error listeners of the dispatcher of an error.
        Parameters:
        errorType - the type of the error
        line - the line where a problem was encountered
        position - the position in line
        message - the error message

      • warnErrorListeners

                        int line,
                        int position,
                        String message)

        line - the line where a problem was encountered
        position - the position in line
        message - the error message
